QuestData.Title: The Consumed
QuestData.Description: <The whelpling is alive, but unconscious. One of the withered must have already drained it of mana.>$b$b<You've already learned that exposed ley crystals contain a small amount of magical energy. Perhaps you can use one to revive some of the whelps.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Dim Ley Crystal, then revive $2oa Mana-Drained Whelplings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Clever $r. Yes, a ley crystal should bring them back to their senses.
QuestData.RewardText: I owe you a great debt, $n.$b$bHelping a weakened old dragon like me is valorous enough. Saving my whelplings, and securing the future of our bloodline?$b$bI am now firmly committed to your cause.
